channel.title: Dtmf on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in Dtmf on Noetic Nought

item.title: Recurse Center, 2014-06-26
item.description: I played around a little bit with my emacs configuration and got jedi working, with virtualenvs, thanks to virtualenvwrapper.el Continue to work on the singal processing stuff and built a DTMF decoder using FFTs. It’s able to decode audacity generated audio, but not recorded ones. I’m not sure what I’m doing wrong, yet. As with every Thursday, there were a bunch of interesting presentations: A rice cooker hooked up to an arduino in an afternoon! A presentation on how scopes act as monoids An implementation of Eularian Video Magnification A regex engine visualizer using NetworkX. A tag system to organize your files A web-socket based chat client A Go Parser written in Go …
